ValidationRule.description: Validate the addon to restrict on decreasing the accommodation nights when the status is active or secured.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL( AddOn_Status__c , 'Secured') || ISPICKVAL( AddOn_Status__c , 'Active') ) && (( PRIORVALUE( AE_Nights__c ) > AE_Nights__c ) || ( PRIORVALUE( SB_Nights__c ) > SB_Nights__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: AE Nights cannot be changed, please follow the Credit Type Cancellation Process to make this change.
